attributes.action: stop the high tax on people who have to take on a second or third job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I work full time and needed to get two other jobs to help pay for everyday things.  I get paid minimum wages for both jobs, but these are further reduced by 25% tax becouse its a 2nd job. Tried to email someone about it but can't find a contact.
